summary: Nightingale Armor with steel protection and a very sinister Skull Mask.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------
NightingGale Skull Mask
-----------------------

Version 0.3

By Exium

!!NOTE!!
This is just for those who may have the previous version and want to switch to either the recolor or mask alone.. Make sure you remove the previous version first. See below :) 

{: Changes :}

-----------------
Version 0.3
-----------------
Completely redid this as i noticed there was some quality loss due to double compression on my part.
Also edited some of the nightingale symbol to be more symmetrical aswell as some other minor changes.
-----------------

---------------
Version 0.2
---------------
Added female version and recolored the shoulder pads (thanks rayli for the suggestion).
----------------


{: Install :}

Extract to \" Skyrim\\Data \" folder.


{: Uninstall :}

Delete the \"nightingale\" folder in \" Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\" .


{: Legal :}

Please contact me before redistributing this mod.
Do not use assets from the mod without permission.
author: Exium

files.name: Nightingale Skull Mask - Mask and Recolor
